bibl.title: Letter from Wilbert W. White to Howard A. Kelly, May 21, 1908

div1.p: White thanks Kelly for the reprint of his address on Carroll.

div1.head: Letter from Wilbert W. White to Howard A. Kelly, May 21, 1908
div1.opener:
PRESIDENT
WILBERT W. WHITE
TREASURER
JOSEPH T. BROWN
SECRETARY
ORRIN R. JUDD
Bible Teachers Training School
541 LEXINGTON AVENUE
(Cor. Forty-ninth Street)
NEW YORK CITY
May 21st, 1908.
L.
ans
TELEPHONE: 2430 PLAZA
CABLE ADDRESS: BITECOL
Dear Dr. Kelly:
div1.p:
I thank you cordially for your kind re-
membrance in sending the addresses on Major Carroll.

I wish it might be possible for you to
be present at our graduating exercises. I am sending
you and Mrs. Kelly an invitation.
div1.closer:
I remain,
Very sincerely yours, Wilbert W. White. Dr. H. A. Kelly,
1418 Eutaw Place,
Baltimore, Md.
